name: Next Level
description: The amount of XP to get to the next level.

name: Carry Weight
description: How much you can carry.

name: Fertility
description: How fertile you are. Determines the likelihood of impregnation during sex.

name: Party Limit
description: How many people you can have in your party.

name: Skill Growth Rate
description: The rate at which your skills improve.

name: Weight
description: How much you are carrying.

name: Range Damage
description: How much base damage you do with ranged weapons

name: Combat Sequence
description: How fast you are to act in combat.

name: Luck
description: How fortunate you are.

name: Endurance
description: How much stamina you have.

name: Charisma
description: How charismatic you are.

name: Intelligence
description: How smart you are.

name: Strength
description: How strong you are.

name: Perception
description: How observant you are.

name: Agility
description: How agile you are.

name: Critical Chance
description: The change of scoring a critical hit.

name: Damage Threshold
description: How much damage is blocked by armor.

name: Damage Resistance
description: How much damage is reduced by armor.

name: Melee Damage
description: How much base damage you do in melee combat.

name: Evade
description: How likely you are to evade an attack.

name: Critical Multiplier
description: How powerful your critical hits are.

name: Radiation Resisance
description: How much you can resist radiation,  emissions and other forms of obtrusive energy.

name: Poison Resistance
description: How much you can resist toxicity, poisons, and other biological impediments.

name: Mental Resistance
description: How resistant you are to psychological or psionic manipulation.

name: Horniness
description: How horny you are. The hornier you are, the less focused you are and the more susceptible you are to seduction.

name: AP
description: Your action points.

name: HP
description: Your hit points.

name: Psi
description: Your patience for certain interactions.

name: Max HP
description: Your maximum hit points. Determined by Endurance and Level.

name: Max Patience
description: Your maximum patience. Determined by Intelligence.

name: Max AP
description: Your maximum action points. Determined by Agility.

name: Level
description: The level you are at.

name: XP
description: How much experience points you've acrrued.
